Nokia would contribute its expertise on hardware design, language support, and help bring Windows Phone to a larger range of price points, market segments and geographies," the firm said in a statement. The partnership announced today provides incredible scale, vast expertise in hardware and software innovation and a proven ability to execute, said Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer .
